inviting_them_to_be_digitally_authorised: inviting them to be digitally authorised to file online for this company.
page_header: What happens now you’ve invited this person to be digitally authorised
they_will_need_to_either_accept_or_decli: They will need to either accept or decline the invitation to be digitally authorised.
weve_also_sent_an_email: We’ve also sent an email to any other people who are authorised to let them know.
